Welcome to the Tree Planting App Help Center


Frequently Asked Questions:


1. How do I start planting trees?
 • Navigate to "New Planting" on the home screen
 • Select or add a new planting area
 • Follow the step-by-step planting guide


2. How is CO₂ offset calculated?
 • Each tree planted is estimated to offset 20kg of CO₂ annually
 • Calculations are based on average tree growth patterns


3. Technical Support:
 • Email: support@treeplantingapp.com
 • Phone: 1-800-TREE-HELP
 • Hours: Monday-Friday, 9AM-5PM EST


For more detailed information, visit our website or contact our support team.
